title: Create data-driven PowerBI bot

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store and manage bot configuration including data sources, query parameters, and bot responses

quotes: using powerbi create a bot that run by data

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can store bot configuration data
Data model supports multiple data source connections
Configuration includes query parameters and response templates

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to process data queries and generate bot responses based on stored data patterns

quotes: create a bot that run by data

acceptanceCriteria: Backend can execute data queries
Bot generates responses based on data patterns
Results are formatted for frontend consumption

requirements.text: Build a dashboard interface to display PowerBI-style data visualizations including charts, graphs, and key metrics
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays data visualizations
Interface includes charts and graphs
Key metrics are prominently displayed
Visualizations update based on bot data processing

requirements.text: Create a chat interface where users can interact with the bot to query data and receive data-driven responses

quotes: create a bot that run by data

acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface allows user input
Bot responds to data queries
Conversation history is displayed
Response includes relevant data insights

requirements.text: Implement data upload and import functionality allowing users to connect data sources that the bot will analyze
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload data files
Backend processes and stores uploaded data
Bot can access and analyze imported data
Data validation is performed on upload

requirements.text: Design a professional, data-analytics focused visual theme with a clean layout emphasizing data clarity, using a corporate color palette (charcoal, emerald green, white) with clear typography and structured information hierarchy suitable for business intelligence applications
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color scheme across all components
Typography enhances data readability
Layout prioritizes data visualization and clarity
Professional appearance suitable for business users

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend implementation
Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Cannot integrate external PowerBI services or APIs
All data processing must happen within the Internet Computer actor
nonGoals: Direct integration with Microsoft PowerBI cloud services
Real-time data streaming from external databases
Multi-user collaboration features in this initial build

required: Bot avatar icon with data analytics theme, geometric design (bot-avatar.dim_128x128.png)
Dashboard header background with subtle data visualization pattern (dashboard-header.dim_1200x300.png)
